Caption: Figure 1 – The spatiotemporal multivariate hypercube: a metaphor for considering spatiotemporal multivariate event data in one integrated visualization, transition, and interaction framework to support the detection of multidimensional patterns.

Figure 2 – Abstract representation of the spatiotemporal multivariate hypercube. In the developed tool, each projection shows a set of juxtaposed visualisations per variable. Framework rules ensure integral overview when transitioning from one projection to another.
